title: What are some good ideas for kids' educational apps? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most apps are focused on teaching the alphabet, mathematics, animal sounds, etc. Won’t kids learn these things at school anyway? What is the point of giving them a one or two lesson’s head start?Ergo:- A good kids education app teaches kids something they will not learn at school- A good kids education app will inspire children- A good kids education app will focus on being fun and playful to not get boring Einee - Talk to Einstein (iOS | Android) allows kids to talk to Einstein, Cleopatra, Donald Trump, Leonardo Da Vinci, Marilyn Monroe, and Napoleon Bonaparte.  Einee - Talk to Einstein’s (iOS | Android) focus is to inspire children about individuals that have achieved greatness, it teaches about the characters’ life in their days, and their achievements.Most importantly, it’s a play-first application. Its focus is on being fun and goofy so that kids will naturally want to play with it. The learning and inspiration that comes from using Einee is the secondary focus, allowing them to unintentionally absorb the information. Please note, I am the founder of Einee.
